channel.title: Inxity 637 Release (RuneScape 2011)
channel.description:
[size=24pt][font=andale mono]Inxity 637 Release[/font][/size]
[b]Yellow[/b] from Rune-Server.org gave me permission to release this on the MoparScape forums. In his original post, he said the following: "[b][i]So, I am deciding to release my late 637 project [ Inxity #637 ] because I am working on another server or might give a shot at writing my own framework so this may be helpful for few people enjoy.[/i][/b]" [b] Download Package: [url=http://download.nalifornia.com/Inxity%20637%20Package.zip]http://download.nalifornia.com/Inxity%20637%20Package.zip[/url][/b] [b]Package Contains[/b]: Server, Cache & Client [b]Based On:[/b] Dementhium (Non SQL) 637/639
[code]-Fixed character saving and apperance. -Added full character customizing. -Started a tutorial. -Made bank "withdrawl X" amount stick. -Added pretty decent revenant caves. -Now able to re-gain your summoning points by using obelisks. -Added report abuse. When a player is reported, if there is a staff member online it will send them a message about the report and make a System.out.println. If there is no staff member on it'll create a report in PlayerReports.txt. -Started experience lamps. -Rewrote player saftey exams -Finished experience lamps. -Completed fishing guild! -Dementhium door fix applied. -Finished Mystery boxes. -Dialogue fixes. -Dupe / bug corrections. -Clan punishments and savings. -Added random server messages every 5 minutes. -World messages for reaching 99 in a skill. -Added Alching -Added GodSword Dismantling - credits to Magnito -fixed ctrl+shift teleporting -implemented URL links into the client and source -re-done alot of the dialogues -added transparent developer console -new pure 639 cache! thanks to Wildskiller! -Bones on altar working, all bones are able to be used to gain some prayer xp! -100% report system working -re-wrote player safety exam code -Guide book updated -started on a g.e base -all pickaxes are now supported for mining -added more things in constructionutils -fixed alot of warning in the source -cleaned the code in cooking.java, re-organised everything ect -re-done more dialogues in the src -fixed problem with names and re-uploaded[/code]
[b]Media:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vIIEr4k.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0Kqlu3y.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fjX8zP0.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DxefcFt.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ewTlAJz.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eWmyxX8.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FptS3yf.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QyFZ3Z2.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZWHl539.png[/img]
[b][size=14pt][font=trebuchet ms]Permission[/font][/size]:[/b] [img]http://community.nalifornia.com/uploads/images/1400859389.png[/img]

item.title: Inxity 637 Release (RuneScape 2011)
item.dc:creator: @Nalifornia Nalifornia
item.description:
@Nalifornia wrote:

[size=24pt][font=andale mono]Inxity 637 Release[/font][/size]

Yellow from Rune-Server.org gave me permission to release this on the MoparScape forums.
In his original post, he said the following: "So, I am deciding to release my late 637 project [ Inxity #637 ] because I am working on another server or might give a shot at writing my own framework so this may be helpful for few people enjoy."

Download Package: http://download.nalifornia.com/Inxity%20637%20Package.zip
Package Contains: Server, Cache & Client
Based On: Dementhium (Non SQL) 637/639

-Fixed character saving and apperance. -Added full character customizing. -Started a tutorial. -Made bank "withdrawl X" amount stick. -Added pretty decent revenant caves. -Now able to re-gain your summoning points by using obelisks. -Added report abuse. When a player is reported, if there is a staff member online it will send them a message about the report and make a System.out.println. If there is no staff member on it'll create a report in PlayerReports.txt. -Started experience lamps. -Rewrote player saftey exams -Finished experience lamps. -Completed fishing guild! -Dementhium door fix applied. -Finished Mystery boxes. -Dialogue fixes. -Dupe / bug corrections. -Clan punishments and savings. -Added random server messages every 5 minutes. -World messages for reaching 99 in a skill. -Added Alching -Added GodSword Dismantling - credits to Magnito -fixed ctrl+shift teleporting -implemented URL links into the client and source -re-done alot of the dialogues -added transparent developer console -new pure 639 cache! thanks to Wildskiller! -Bones on altar working, all bones are able to be used to gain some prayer xp! -100% report system working -re-wrote player safety exam code -Guide book updated -started on a g.e base -all pickaxes are now supported for mining -added more things in constructionutils -fixed alot of warning in the source -cleaned the code in cooking.java, re-organised everything ect -re-done more dialogues in the src -fixed problem with names and re-uploaded

Media:

[size=14pt][font=trebuchet ms]Permission[/font][/size]:

Read full topic
